trans-unit.source: Encapsulates security decisions about an application.
trans-unit.target: Innkapsler sikkerhet beslutninger om et program.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: An ApplicationTrust object is returned by a trust manager's <xref:System.Security.Policy.IApplicationTrustManager.DetermineApplicationTrust%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Et ApplicationTrust objekt returneres av en klarert manager <xref:System.Security.Policy.IApplicationTrustManager.DetermineApplicationTrust%2A>metode.</xref:System.Security.Policy.IApplicationTrustManager.DetermineApplicationTrust%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an empty <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust> object.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren oppretter et tomt <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>objektet.</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"></xref> class with an <xref href="System.ApplicationIdentity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"> </xref> klasse med en <xref href="System.ApplicationIdentity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An application identity contains the full name of the application and the location of its code base.
trans-unit.target: En tjenesteprogramidentiteten inneholder hele navnet på programmet og plasseringen av koden base.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ApplicationIdentity"></xref> that uniquely identifies an application.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ApplicationIdentity"> </xref> som identifiserer en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"></xref> class using the provided grant set and collection of full-trust assemblies.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"> </xref> klasse ved hjelp av angitte gi sett og samling fullstendig klarering samlinger.

trans-unit.source: `fullTrustAssemblies` identifies strong-named assemblies within the <xref:System.AppDomain> that are to be granted full trust.
trans-unit.target: `fullTrustAssemblies`identifiserer sterkt navn samlinger i den <xref:System.AppDomain>som er gis fullstendig klarering.</xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called by the <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateDomain%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to create an <xref:System.AppDomain> that will be used as a sandbox.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren kalles av den <xref:System.AppDomain.CreateDomain%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metode for å opprette en <xref:System.AppDomain>som skal brukes som en sandkassen.</xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.AppDomain.CreateDomain%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about running an application in a sandbox, see [How to: Run Partially Trusted Code in a Sandbox](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du kjører en applikasjon i en sandkassen [slik: kjøre delvis klarert kode i en sandkassen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A default permission set that is granted to all assemblies that do not have specific grants.
trans-unit.target: Et standard tillatelsessett som er gitt til alle samlinger som ikke har bestemt gir.

trans-unit.source: An array of strong names that represent assemblies that should be considered fully trusted in an application domain.
trans-unit.target: En matrise med sterkt navn som representerer samlingene anses som fullstendig klarerte i et programdomene.

trans-unit.source: fullTrustAssemblies is .
trans-unit.target: fullTrustAssembliesis .

trans-unit.source: fullTrustAssemblies contains an assembly that does not have a .
trans-unit.target: fullTrustAssembliesinneholder en samling som ikke har en .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the application identity for the application trust object.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir program-ID for klarering applikasjonsobjektet.

trans-unit.source: The ApplicationIdentity property uniquely identifies a manifest-based application to be activated in a new domain.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ApplicationIdentity identifiserer et manifest-basert program aktiveres i et nytt domene.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ApplicationIdentity"></xref> for the application trust object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ApplicationIdentity"> </xref> for klarering applikasjonsobjektet.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.ApplicationIdentity"></xref> cannot be set because it has a value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ApplicationIdentity"></xref>kan ikke angis fordi den har en <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new object that is a complete copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter et nytt objekt som er et fullstendig eksemplar av den gjeldende forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: A duplicate copy of this application trust object.
trans-unit.target: En kopi av denne applikasjonsobjektet klarering.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the policy statement defining the default grant set.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir uttrykket policy definere standard gi.

trans-unit.source: The DefaultGrantSet property represents the permissions that are granted to the application.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen DefaultGrantSet representerer tillatelsene som er gitt til programmet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement> representing the default grants is initialized using a <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> and optional attributes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement>som representerer standard gir er initialisert med et <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>og valgfri attributter.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> </xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement"></xref> describing the default grants.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement"> </xref> som beskriver standard gir.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets extra security information about the application.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir ekstra sikkerhetsinformasjon om applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: An object containing additional security information about the application.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som inneholder flere sikkerhetsinformasjon om applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs an <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"></xref> object with a given state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: Rekonstruerer en <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"> </xref> objekt med en gitt tilstand fra en XML-koding.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.ISecurityPolicyEncodable.ToXml%2A> and <xref:System.Security.ISecurityPolicyEncodable.FromXml%2A> methods are implemented to make <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust> objects XML-encodable for security policy use.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.ISecurityPolicyEncodable.ToXml%2A>og <xref:System.Security.ISecurityPolicyEncodable.FromXml%2A>implementeres metoder for å gjøre <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>objekter XML-kode krav for sikkerhet policy bruk.</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust> </xref:System.Security.ISecurityPolicyEncodable.FromXml%2A> </xref:System.Security.ISecurityPolicyEncodable.ToXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: XML-koding til å bruke Bygg opp den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: element is .
trans-unit.target: elementis .

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding used for element is invalid.
trans-unit.target: XML-kodingen som brukes element er ugyldig.

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of full-trust assemblies for this application trust.
trans-unit.target: Henter listen over samlinger fullstendig klarering for denne applikasjonen klarering.

trans-unit.source: The list identifies assemblies that are to be granted full trust within the <xref:System.AppDomain> that is associated with this <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust> instance.
trans-unit.target: Listen identifiserer samlinger som skal gis fullstendig klarering i den <xref:System.AppDomain>som er knyttet til dette <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>forekomsten.</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust> </xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: The assemblies are identified by their strong names.
trans-unit.target: Samlingene identifiseres med sterkt navn.

trans-unit.source: A list of full-trust assemblies.
trans-unit.target: En liste over fullstendig klarering samlinger.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application has the required permission grants and is trusted to run.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om programmet har de nødvendige tillatelsen gir og er klarert for å kjøre.

trans-unit.source: A trust manager sets the IsApplicationTrustedToRun property to `true` when an application has been approved to execute.
trans-unit.target: En angir egenskapen IsApplicationTrustedToRun til `true` når et program er godkjent til å kjøre.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the application is trusted to run; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis programmet er klarert for å kjøre. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether application trust information is persisted.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om klarering applikasjonsinformasjon er fast.

trans-unit.source: When the Persist property is `true`, application trust information is saved to the ClickOnce application store.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen Persist er `true`, klarering programinformasjonen lagres i appbutikken ClickOnce.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if application trust information is persisted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis programmet klareringsinformasjonen beholdes; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"></xref> object and its current state.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en XML-kodingen for den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust"> </xref> objektet og den gjeldende tilstanden.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.ISecurityPolicyEncodable.ToXml%2A> and <xref:System.Security.ISecurityPolicyEncodable.FromXml%2A> methods are implemented to make <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust> objects XML-encodable for security policy use.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Security.ISecurityPolicyEncodable.ToXml%2A>og <xref:System.Security.ISecurityPolicyEncodable.FromXml%2A>implementeres metoder for å gjøre <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust>objekter XML-kode krav for sikkerhet policy bruk.</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationTrust> </xref:System.Security.ISecurityPolicyEncodable.FromXml%2A> </xref:System.Security.ISecurityPolicyEncodable.ToXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: XML-koding av sikkerhetsobjekt, inkludert tilstandsinformasjon.
